title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Bad economic situation creates more crimes always.Right now crime is going on and more need to spend for security so If the Fed and all others central banks Will turn off the printers it's not cheap becouse what they do with crimimals.Soon many people need bodyguards and not good to drive Even in Western countries with flashy cars crime are rapant.So anyways we all want safe life so we know solution we got to turn on money printers and make sure inflation not going high.Back in the days people use to be soft more but now people cant handle dangerous surroundings.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: If its related about looting or any theft maybe that can relay to a bad economy.But if the security is the issue here I guess there is something worst aside from the economic status, maybe the government is not doing their best to control such crime and make the country safe. Tourism can be a good source of income but if the country is not secured for that, probably tourist will not come. The government should also ensure the safety of every people while dealing with the economic crisis, by this they can rise again at the right time.

comments.author: Mahanton
comments.body: When they had turned off their printers? For sure it hadnt been done ever since considering on what would be the effects and this is why we do see that inflation due to continous printing but of course it would really be that on controlled manner because if they would really be doing this then we can already picture out on what would really gonna happen.Speaking of criminality then it is really just a normal thing that we do seeon a society since from the beginning of time where there are people who are really that having this kind of mindset even if they arent on a verge or situation where they have not something to eatbut rather they do have other personal motives and intents which is really not that always pertain about economical aspect.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: When economy is totally bad, many will be affected coming from the poorest of the poor even to the middle class. There will be more crimes as life is too bad and jobs will become limited. While every other type of people at the top and rich class, they will become richer and will not feel the situation.While those affected ones, they're just trying to live their lives to survive.

comments.author: Fortify
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 22, 2022, 09:00:24 PMBad economic situation creates more crimes always.Right now crime is going on and more need to spend for security so If the Fed and all others central banks Will turn off the printers it's not cheap becouse what they do with crimimals.Soon many people need bodyguards and not good to drive Even in Western countries with flashy cars crime are rapant.So anyways we all want safe life so we know solution we got to turn on money printers and make sure inflation not going high.Back in the days people use to be soft more but now people cant handle dangerous surroundings.While you have a good idea with your first sentence, your second sentence is an absolute mess and after that you really seem to lose the plot. Don't you worry about the richest people who are paying body guards for protection, because they certainly don't think about you and are more shielded than the average person on the street will ever be. I don't know what poor and corrupt country you are from, but even in the middle of the worst recessions people are free to drive in their flashy cars without fear in most western countries. Your ideas about turning on and off the printers are totally detached from how crime levels are fluctuating. You can have recessions whether central banks are gorging or not.

First, because there are opportunities that the perpetrators can take advantage of against those who will become victims, and second, because there is still hunger among a group of people, so they choose to commit various crimes in order to get what they want in life. One of them is money and food, and it certainly doesn't look surprising in some poor and developing countries because usually job vacancies in poor and developing countries are not that many.QuoteSo anyways we all want safe life so we know solution we got to turn on money printers and make sure inflation not going high.Back in the days people use to be soft more but now people cant handle dangerous surroundings.Printing too much money without having a certain amount according to the cheat rules will also be very dangerous. Because when there is more money circulating in society and it cannot be controlled by certain parties within a country. Then the value of the currency will also decrease so that money will look like paper that has no value because there is nothing to rely on anymore.

comments.author: Hydrogen
comments.body: I was watching the content of an independent investigative reporter travelling through american cities to see how bad things were. When she arrived there was a man lying on the sidewalk spasming, while surrounded by discarded needles. Overdosing on whatever drug. She interviews one of the city residents and they say that its normal for them to have around 5 people overdose and die in the streets everyday. She interviews a local business. Across the street a store is being robbed. The business owner says its normal for them to be robbed 3 to 5 times everyday.It is possible everyone underestimates how bad things are getting in big cities in the united states. America didn't see this type of wholesale homelessness, crime and violence until the economic crisis of 2008. But now it seems that things are getting worse. Its bringing out the worst behavior in many. Hopefully it will also bring some good, although I can't see much indications of it.

In this modern era, so many people just focus themself without thinking the other situation.

comments.author: $anounimus$
comments.body: The economic environment affects people's morale and that is why they need better protection. People need to understand that crime is linked to a bad economy. When the rules of the market economy are distorted, opportunities for delinquency can arise.Yes. The government also plays an important role in the economy, where the government needs to think about, make good regulations, and protect small or large investors or entrepreneurs with terms and conditions that apply so that fair competition will produce fair results.Providing employment opportunities for the community and receiving payment in accordance with the minimum wage standard in a country is a component that is considered important and urgent to reduce the growth of the unemployment rate.

comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 22, 2022, 09:00:24 PMBad economic situation creates more crimes always.Right now crime is going on and more need to spend for security so If the Fed and all others central banks Will turn off the printers it's not cheap becouse what they do with crimimals.People who are squeezed with all their needs and debts will always find ways to meet all their needs. comments.author: glendall
comments.body: it is common knowledge that if the economy is bad the crime rate will be high, but this will always happen if the government of one country cannot solve its economic problems in a sustainable manner, and they never measure the economy of the lower middle class (poor) they measure only the top,Talking about economic problems will never end, for now survival is the key to dealing with increasingly high inflation, keep trying and developing ideas in your brain to create jobs for those in need so they can help the economy someone

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Bad economy is already an incentive to bad habits and character to be exhibited. If an economy is bad it is likely also that it could be facing collapsed security system because there will be increased level of insecurity as a result of the people taking to the street to take advantage of the vulnerable and weaker people. Intimidation, molestation are going to increase and guns will find there way inside the country too. To survive the bad guys on street will see the insecurity as an opportunity to go into drugs and other illicit substances. This will make the situation worse to be controlled. There is need for the government to ensure that the youth find jobs to do because they are the active population and can go off the hook if not taken care of.
